name: Global uniques
uniques: [-25]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-1] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [0] Happiness>
[+25]% growth [in capital] <during We Love The King Day>
[-75]% growth [in all cities] <in cities with less than [5] [Population]>
[-100]% growth [in all cities] <in cities with at least [5] [Population]>
[+75]% growth [in capital] <in cities with less than [5] [Population]>
[+100]% growth [in capital] <in cities with at least [5] [Population]>
